metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39358 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In GNOME libgfbgraph through 0.2.4, gfbgraph-photo.c does not enable TLS certificate verification on the SoupSessionSync objects it creates, leaving users vulnerable to network MITM attacks. NOTE: this is similar to CVE-2016-20011.

criterions.comment: gfbgraph: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
